snippet: Experts see a long road ahead for the women freed from a Cleveland house, and a need for family support, therapy and privacy.
abstract: Mental health experts see long road ahead for Amanda Berry, Gina DeJesus and Michelle Knight, kidnapped women freed from Cleveland house of their kidnapper Ariel Castro, and a need for family support, therapy and privacy.

byline.contributor: Steven Yaccino contributed reporting from Cleveland.

lead_paragraph: Experts see a long road ahead for the women freed from a Cleveland house, and a need for family support, therapy and privacy.

headline.seo: Emotional Recovery Seen Possible in Cleveland Case
headline.main: Emotional Recovery Seen Possible for Victims of Prolonged Abuse
headline.print_headline: Emotional Recovery Seen Possible for Victims of Prolonged Abuse
